Sentence: It turns out the anonymous company , BaikalFinansGroup , shares an address with OOO Tverneftemash , which was recently bought by ZAO Gazpromgeocomservice , not to ever be confused by the similarly-named Gazprom ( which by the way has a similar logo ) .
